segments.text: Ten dollars ? Maybe there are a lot of them ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Seven dollars ! ! ! Incredible ! But I saw that the seller has kind of a bad rating .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Was it a delivery problem or a problem with the products ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I read that someone called him a cheat and a liar ! And I noticed that he won't ship abroad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some people get nasty on those comments . Maybe you should write him and ask nicely .
segments.speaker: S1
